sentences.sContent: South American women use the fruit to nourish their skin and hair.
sentences.sContent_eng: South American women use the fruit to nourish their skin and hair.
sentences.sCn: 南美洲的妇女都用这种水果来滋养她们的皮肤和头发。

sentences.sContent: But when explorers first brought this South American vegetable back to Europe, peasants feared it would cause leprosy.
sentences.sContent_eng: But when explorers first brought this South American vegetable back to Europe, peasants feared it would cause leprosy.
sentences.sCn: 然而，当探险者当初把这种南美洲的蔬菜带回欧洲时，农民害怕吃了它后会得麻风病。

sentences.sContent: With their high fat and vitamin E content, avocados are both delicious and good for you. South American women use the fruit to nourish their skin and hair.
sentences.sContent_eng: With their high fat and vitamin E content, avocados are both delicious and good for you. South American women use the fruit to nourish their skin and hair.
sentences.sCn: 鳄梨蕴含大量的脂肪以及维他命E，不仅美味而且益处多多。南美洲的妇女都用这种水果来滋养她们的皮肤和头发。

trans.tranOther: of or relating to the continent of South America or its inhabitants
